title: Senior Frontend Engineer
summary: Lead development of high‑impact, user‑facing web experiences at massive scale. Own complex frontend systems, mentor engineers, and partner cross‑functionally to ship delightful, accessible products.
responsibilities: Design and build performant, accessible React/TypeScript applications.
Own large features end‑to‑end: scoping, architecture, implementation, rollout.
Advance frontend platform: component libraries, performance, observability.
Collaborate with Product, Design, and Backend to define roadmap and milestones.
Mentor and level‑up teammates; champion code quality and best practices.
minimumQualifications: 5+ years building production web apps with modern JS (ES2017+).
Expertise in React, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3 (CSS‑in‑JS or utility frameworks).
Proficiency with performance profiling (Lighthouse, Web Vitals) and accessibility (WCAG, ARIA).
Experience with API integration, GraphQL/REST, and state management.
Strong testing background (unit/integration/E2E) and CI workflows.
preferredQualifications: Experience at scale (millions of DAU) and progressive enhancement strategies.
SSR/SSG and routing (Next.js), and module federation/code‑splitting expertise.
Data visualization (Recharts/D3), i18n/l10n, and design systems.
